text: Sodankylä is a municipality in Lapland. Almost 8,890 people lived there in January 2014. The municipalities next to it are Inari, Kemijärvi, Kittilä, Pelkosenniemi, Rovaniemi and Savukoski. == Some villages == Some villages in Sodankylä are Kersilö, Kierinki, Lismanaapa, Luosto, Torvinen. == Other websites == * Category:Municipalities of Lapland (Finland)
title: Sodankylä
